name: 'Trentham' Sweater
description:
Boasting Gun Flaps at front and a Storm Flap at rear this Trench-styled Sweater is a must for winter.

•	Gun/Storm flaps 100% Wool 
•	Darts at shoulder line 
•	Raglan Sleeve 
•	Round neckline 
•	Mid thigh length 
•	Generous sleeve length

description:
Merino lined Mohair vest, quilted with our signature logo.

•	100% Mohair Wool Outer
•	100% Merino Lining

description:
In an ode to our alpine locality, the silhouette of Mt Ruapehu features in our baseball style print adorning this ultra-warm 280gsm Merino sweater.

•	‘The Good Life’ signature print
•	Darts at shoulder line
•	Raglan Sleeve

•	Generous sleeve length

•	Contrast Hood Lining

description:
Preppy pockets and contrasting button detail give these soft wool trousers a timeless twist. A hint of lycra stretch make them perfect for the office or the outdoors.
•	Zip at Rear
•	Mock Fly Front
•	96% Wool, 4% Lycra
•	Front Pockets at Hip

description:
Luxuriously soft and ultra warm, designed for your comfort, this long sleeved baseball style long sleeved tee will have you living ‘The Good Life’.

LIMITED EDITION!!

•	96% Wool, 4% Lycra

description:

•	60% Angora, 40% Wool

•	Must-touch Texture

description:

•	Genuine Leather Detailing
•	Ankle Length
•	Pleated Bust
•	Racer Back

description:
Supersoft merino with ruffled detailing at front makes this a perfectly multifunctional piece.

•	100% Merino Wool
•	Generous Sleeve Length
•	Hip Length
•	Front Ruffle Detailing

name: 'Morgan' Merino Minidress
description:
Who says you have to choose between looking hot or staying warm? 
Now you can do both in this supersoft 100% Merino Minidress.

•	100% Merino Wool
•	Genuine Leather Detailing
•	Double Layered Body
•	Odour and Stain Resistant

description:
Pretty in pink, this wool blend skirt also comes pretty in Prussian Navy or Taxi Yellow.

•	96% Wool, 4% Lycra

•	Concealed Zip at Rear
•	Above Knee Hem

name: 'Oriental Bay' Dress
description:
Origami style folds on the detachable peplum make this dress an easily transitional piece from the office out on the town.


•	Fitted Shift Dress 
•	Hem at mid thigh
•	High Rounded Neckline at Front
•	Square Neckline at Rear
•	Detachable Peplum

•	Concealed Zip at Rear

name: 'Kimono' Cardigan
description:
This season you need look no further for the essential summer cardigan. From days in the sun through to evening barbeques, we have made this merino cardigan multi-functional to transition the changing temperatures.


•	Ties at side seams to tie cardigan at the back or front
•	Cotton ribbon trim
•	Hem at hip
•	Folding or standing collar
•	Long sleeves
•	Teal: 96% Merino  4% Lycra
•	Marled Grey: 100% Merino

name: 'Skipper' Dress
description:
Prim and proper and a little bit naughty, this pleated dress with fitted bodice and deep V back is perfect for summer special occasion dressing.

•	100% Linen
•	Backless
•	Scoop neck
•	Pleated knee length skirt
•	Zip and hook & eye at rear

name: 'Cabin Crew' Playsuit
description:
This playful piece is crafted in 100% Organic Cotton, hand dyed to order. Pockets at the side seams, zip at rear and V-cut back, the 'Cabin Crew' Playsuit is perfect for a barefoot day at the beach or an evening out with heels and a handbag.


•	100% Organic Cotton
•	Crossover Front with hook and eye fastening
•	Side seam pockets
•	Rear zip closure
•	Hem at upper thigh

name: 'Daybreak' Dress
description:
Golden Chartruese glows in this Organic Cotton wrap dress. Trenchcoat styling with belted waist gives an hourglass silhouette, perfectly suited to the coming sunny weather.

•	100% Organic Cotton Drill
•	Gun and storm flaps
•	Sleeveless
•	Self-fabric belt
•	Custom dyed

name: 'Blue Sunday' Skirt
description:
Blue skies and lazy Sundays’ have inspired this Colour blocked high waisted skirt. Made from silk this skirt is a summers dream!

•	100% Silk Habotai
•	Custom colour schemes available
•	Slim waistband
•	Hidden zip at side

Made to order so choose your personal color scheme!

name: 'Regatta' Jacket
description:
Smart and smooth, the ‘Regatta’ Silk lined lightweight wool jacket is ideal for throwing on when the breeze picks up or the sun goes down .

•	100% Wool outer
•	100% Silk lined
•	Self-fabric belt
•	Contrast topstitching
•	Multi wear options
•	Exposed contrast lining

name: 'Scout' Sweater
description:
Scoop necked with V cutout at the front, this flirty merino lightweight sweater is an essential for your holiday packlist. “Be prepared” is the Scout moto and you will certainly be prepared for any adventure with this sweater !

•	UV resistant
•	Generous length sleeves
•	Low waistband
•	Scoop neck
•	100% Merino
•	Available in Grey Marled or Cobalt Blue

name: ‘Pleat your heart out’ Sweater
description:
The ‘Pleat Your Heart Out’ lightweight sweater boasts pretty pleats across the chest, raglan sleeves with generous length and all the benefits that come with activewear Merino! Keeping you warm when it’s cool and breathable and moisture wicking when it’s warm!

•	U.V resistant
•	Stain and odour resistant
•	Moisture wicking
•	Merino/Poly body
•	Merino/Lycra pleats

name: 'Stormy Skies' Silk Maxi Dress
description:
Printed silk floats in this floor length dress, scoop necked with pleated front, you can count on this dress to have you looking dreamy at any social occasion.

•	100% Silk with stylized leopard print
•	Floor length
•	Scoop neck
•	Pleats at front

name: 'Get Shorty' Linen Shorts
description:
Short shorts are what summer is all about! Bright linen with navy cotton ribbon trim and contrasting button fly, these shorts will keep you feeling cool and looking hot!

•	100% Linen excluding cotton trim
•	Button fly closure
•	Pockets at side seams
•	Hem at upper thigh

description:
Playful silk dress perfect for all the summer events coming up on your social calendar!

In the words of the infamous Tansy Grant:

"If you are dressed like you are going to a party all the time, the more likely you are to be invited to one!!"

•	100% Silk Habotai

•	Buttefly sleeves
